Text: Im using it now but not sure how its gonna look.. not able to edit the DVD menu too much will tell you if it worked or not in a few...

Ok it works great.. I was able to burn an AVI file to DVD that I could not do with Nero, but I would still recommend you keep nero as well because you can burn most AVI files to dvd and it has better menu editing abilities then this one does.. But I do recomend it 100% as a back up or for people new to making DVDS..

I just downloaded this, scanned it, and it seems to be working just fine. I will use it a few times and if there is an issue with a virus, I will post that here.  Thanks for the download andy. its appreciated. ;)
